dbQuery.query: select 'YELLOW' code, 'YELLOW' descr union ALL select 'RED' code, 'RED' descr union all select 'GREEN' code, 'GREEN' descr
select 1 code, 'ДА' descr union ALL select 0 code, 'НЕТ' descr
SELECT CODE, DESCRIPTION AS DESCR, ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF, SOURCE_GCL FROM SUTSTPA.SPRAV_DIAMETER_GCL ORDER BY DESCR

dbCommand.query: INSERT INTO SUTSTPA.SPRAV_DIAMETER_GCL(CODE, DESCRIPTION, ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF, SOURCE_GCL) VALUES ('{CODE}', '{DESCR}', '{ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF}', '{SOURCE_GCL}')
UPDATE SUTSTPA.SPRAV_DIAMETER_GCL SET CODE = '{CODE}' ,DESCRIPTION = '{DESCR}' ,ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF = '{ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF}' ,SOURCE_GCL = '{SOURCE_GCL}' WHERE CODE = '{CODE}'
DELETE from SUTSTPA.SPRAV_VALVE_TYPE_GCL WHERE CODE = '{CODE}'

dbQuery.query: select v.id CODE, spl.description||' ЛПУ, '||spp.description||', '||round(v.station,1)||' км, Dn='||v.nom_diam_id||', '||SPN.description DESCR, 'Y' ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF, 'KZN' SOURCE_GCL from sutstpa.valve v, sutstpa.sprav_lpu_gcl spl, sutstpa.sprav_pipe_gcl spp, sutstpa.sprav_valve_tpa_name_gcl spn where v.lpu=spl.code and v.pipe=spp.code and spn.code=v.name_id
SELECT p.person_id CODE, p.position||', '||p.name||' '||p.last_name DESCR, 'Y' ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF, 'KZN' SOURCE_GCL from sutstpa.notif_person p
SELECT p.user_id ID, p.lastname||' '||p.firstname||' '||p.secondname DESCR, 'Y' ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF, 'KZN' SOURCE_GCL FROM WEB50.B_USER_PRIVATE p where p.status='A' and p.user_id not in (0,1,1045)
SELECT message_id CODE, description DESCR, 'Y' ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF, 'KZN' SOURCE_GCL from sutstpa.notif_message

dbCommand.query: INSERT INTO SUTSTPA.notif_message(CODE, DESCRIPTION, ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF, SOURCE_GCL) VALUES ('{CODE}', '{DESCR}', '{ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF}', '{SOURCE_GCL}')
UPDATE SUTSTPA.notif_message SET CODE = '{CODE}' ,DESCRIPTION = '{DESCR}' ,ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF = '{ACTIVE_INDICATOR_LF}' ,SOURCE_GCL = '{SOURCE_GCL}' WHERE CODE = '{CODE}'
DELETE from SUTSTPA.notif_message WHERE CODE = '{CODE}'
